#summary Exports the table to  a MediaWiki format

Export to MediaWiki

= Motivation =

Exports the table to  a MediaWiki format ,in order to insert the result in a loal mediawiki installation ( http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Tables )

= Solution =

Exports the table to  a *MediaWiki* tabular format.

= Parameters =

  * *Filename* : outout filename

= Input =

  * *input* : Input Table
